entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
